meanings.definition: A building or group of buildings where goods are manufactured or assembled.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced cars every day.
meanings.sent2: The factory was busy with workers assembling toys.
meanings.sent3: The factory workers accidentally made giant teddy bears instead of regular-sized ones.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a factory of creative ideas, churning out new concepts daily.
meanings.sent5: The factory hummed with the sound of machines working tirelessly to create products.

meanings.definition: A place where something is made or processed.
meanings.sent1: The bakery was a sweet factory, producing delicious treats.
meanings.sent2: The farm was a factory of fresh produce, supplying the local market.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen turned into a pancake factory during breakfast rush.
meanings.sent4: His brain was a factory of thoughts, constantly processing information.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a factory of colors, blooming with vibrant flowers.
